ygData.subject: RE: Cazic-Thule: A recommendation
ygData.msgSnippet: If you come into Feer from rathe mts, chances are good you will need to kill the skelly that spawns at the zone.  I bet a lot of invis newbs really hate him!
ygData.messageBody:
If you come into Feer from rathe mts, chances are good you will need to kill
the skelly that spawns at the zone. I bet a lot of invis newbs really hate
him! Then if you run the zone wall to CT, you will prolly pull a skelly or
2 from their camp. And then, look out for the Spectres - they are undead
and see invis. Ok so now your invis will help you avoid Flerb or Herb or
whoever is bouncin that day - but is it worth all that time?

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 12:04 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Cazic-Thule: A recommendation

From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

If you are bound in Arena then you can't get a flute. Or
can
you? If you check the gypsy camp near the entrance to Rathe
Mts. from Lake
Rathe you'll find that they sell bardic instruments. If I'm
bound in Arena
and need a flute to get to my corpse, I'll zone into Rathe
Mts. and kill one
or two lizardman warriors (extrmely green) with my fists and
perhaps bellow.
One or two little lizzies usually nets me enough cash to buy
a flute, and
oftentimes a drum too. Or even easier, I often have a
friend or two there
at the Lake Rathe/Rathe Mts. zone fighting cyclops and such.
I just bum a
plat off of them. :-)


Crier

> >Crier, one question I have, because a couple of my
guildmates
> are in CZ and
> keep bugging me to "Come on Down !"-Do you get bound in
Freeport
> or Arena? I
> am definately sick of High Keep- and saw my Rogue guild
mate shoot from
> 32-38 in like 2 weeks I think.
> And how long does it take you to do the corpse run if you
are in Freeport?
>
> Scanna Swiftsinger
